title: On Your Money: Fall Finance Chores, Smartphone Maintenance And More
teaser: Summer’s over and it’s time to get ready for the fall and winter seasons. For this week’s On Your Money, financial planner Kevin McKinley offers advice on getting ready for the inevitable, with tips on readying your heating system and putting your lawn mower to bed. Plus, he tells you how to get out from under a bad car loan, how to make your smartphone last, and more answers to your personal finance questions.
